data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Saint David, Dominica, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint David, Dominica
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Saint David, Dominica be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 1,098 believers in the state of Saint David the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Saint David to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Rosalie
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Rosalie, Saint David, Dominica.
Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 6,100 people living in Saint David.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Saint David, Dominica to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.section_summary:
the state of Saint David, Dominica has a population of 6,100.

We estimate Saint David has 1,098 people who might know Jesus, 4,520 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 482 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Saint David, Dominica a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”
